trans-unit.source:
Hello %organizer,
the event "%event" (Event number: %uid) will take place in %days days. Currently, there are %registrations registrations for this event.
trans-unit.target:
Hello %organizer,
the event "%event" (Event number: %uid) will take place in %days days. Currently, there are %registrations registrations for this event.

trans-unit.source: Cancelation deadline for "%event" has just passed
trans-unit.target: Cancelation deadline for "%event" has just passed

trans-unit.source:
Hello %organizer,
the speakers' cancelation deadline for the event "%event" has just passed (Event number: %uid, begin date: %begin_date). Currently, the event is neither confirmed nor canceled and there are %registrations registrations for this event.
trans-unit.target:
Hello %organizer,
the speakers' cancelation deadline for the event "%event" has just passed (Event number: %uid, begin date: %begin_date). Currently, the event is neither confirmed nor canceled and there are %registrations registrations for this event.

trans-unit.source: For this event to take place, a minimum number of registrations is needed. In case this number is not reached, the event will not take place. Of course, you then will be notified as soon as possible.
trans-unit.target: For this event to take place, a minimum number of registrations is needed. In case this number is not reached, the event will not take place. Of course, you then will be notified as soon as possible.
